PropertyGroup.description: Contains a set of user-defined `Property` elements.

Item.description: Contains a user-defined item and its metadata.

ItemGroup.description: Contains a set of user-defined `Item` elements.

ItemDefinitionGroup.description: The `ItemDefinitionGroup` element lets you define a set of `Item` definitions, which are metadata values that are applied to all items in the project, by default.

Choose.description: Evaluates child elements to select one set of `ItemGroup` elements and/or `PropertyGroup` elements to evaluate.

When.description: Evaluates child `ItemGroup` and/or `PropertyGroup` elements when its `Condition` is true.

Otherwise.description: Evaluates child `ItemGroup` and/or `PropertyGroup` elements when none of its sibling `When` elements has a `Condition` that is true.

Output.description: Stores task output values in items and properties.

UsingTask.description: Maps the task that is referenced in a `Task` element to the assembly that contains the task implementation.

Target.description: Contains a set of tasks for MSBuild to execute sequentially.

Import.description: Imports the contents of one project file into another project file.

ImportGroup.description: Contains a collection of `Import` elements that are grouped under an optional `Condition`.
